'''Shaken, Not Purred''' is [[Diona]]'s Level 2 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* [[Icy Paws]] does not need to hit an enemy for [[Co-Op Mode|co-op]] teammates to gain a shield.

==Preview==
{{Preview
|file    = Constellation Shaken, Not Purred
}}

==Trivia==
* Shaken, Not Purred is a reference to how fictional spy {{w|James Bond (literary character)|James Bond}} prefers his martini: "{{w|Shaken, not stirred}}."
